name: Klefki
flavorText:
These key collectors threaten any attackers
by fiercely jingling their keys at them.

previous.name: Goodra
previous.flavorText:
This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon
will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving
that Trainer covered in sticky slime.

next.name: Phantump
next.flavorText:
These Pokémon are created when
spirits possess rotten tree stumps.
They prefer to live in abandoned forests.
